item.title: Big Hero 6 Producer Reveals The One Condition For A Sequel Getting Made
item.description: Exclusive: Big Hero 6 producer Roy Conli reveals his one condition for making a sequel to his 2014 hit animated Disney superhero movie.

item.title: The Force Awakens Walked Back A Subtle George Lucas Change, Turning Blasters Into The Ultimate Nightmare Fuel
item.description: A New Hope and The Force Awakens are among the few Star Wars properties to show how dangerous blasters really are, despite how commonly they're used.

item.title: I'm Genuinely Astounded Itâ€™s Been 4 Years Since The MCU Broke A Major Box Office Trend
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe has narrowly missed once again breaking a key box office record that the franchise has some considerable history with.
